underlying_goal: To conduct a structured interview to deconstruct a high-level goal ('overhaul the paper') into a detailed technical specification for the research paper's restructuring.
primary_success: Executing a highly structured, multi-turn interview to systematically clarify ambiguous high-level goals, and then synthesizing the results into a comprehensive, actionable specification document with clear decisions and open questions.
brief_summary: Using a spec-interview skill, Claude conducted a detailed, multi-part interview to clarify the goals for a major paper overhaul. It asked critical questions about framing, methodology, and results, then synthesized the user's answers into a complete specification (`specs/paper-overhaul.md`), successfully turning a vague goal into a concrete plan.
